subject: feat: add role-based view levels (Executive/Management/Developer)
body:
Add view level selector that changes data granularity for different audiences
while keeping the same dashboard layout:

- Executive: aggregated totals, weekly heatmap, summary-only drilldowns
- Management: per-repo groupings, daily heatmap, summary drilldowns
- Developer: individual contributors, hourly heatmap, full commit lists (default)

Implementation includes:
- VIEW_LEVELS config with granularity settings per level
- Aggregation functions (aggregateContributors, aggregateForDrilldown, etc.)
- Modified renderContributors to use aggregation layer
- Modified detail pane to show summaries for non-developer views
- Added renderWeeklyHeatmap and renderDailyHeatmap for different time views
- UI selector in filter sidebar with localStorage persistence

Filters still apply across all view levels. Layout remains consistent.
title: add role-based view levels (Executive/Management/Developer)
